title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the updated image is not displayed. Instead, the original image remains visible.
OB: After importing a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the original image is still displayed.
EB: The expected behavior is that the newly imported image is displayed in the layout.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Observe that the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
